variant_a.name: Romantic Embrace - Golden Hour
variant_a.prompt: Create an ULTRA-REALISTIC, HYPER-DETAILED 4K VIDEO (4 seconds, 60fps) of TWO PEOPLE in an intimate, LOVING EMBRACE with IDENTICAL EXACT FACIAL EXPRESSIONS. Female: auburn wavy hair, warm brown eyes, delicate features, burgundy V-neck dress. Male: dark hair, strong masculine features, black suit + white shirt. CRITICAL: BOTH MUST HAVE IDENTICAL FACES EXPRESSIONS - EXACT SAME SMILE ANGLE, SAME EYE GAZE, IDENTICAL EYEBROW POSITION, SAME MUSCLE TENSION, IDENTICAL LIP CURVE. Perfect skin texture (pore-level detail), every hair strand visible, realistic fabric, professional museum-quality lighting. Golden hour backlighting, cinematic depth of field. ABSOLUTELY PHOTOREALISTIC, 1000% AUTHENTIC, ZERO DISTORTIONS, MATHEMATICAL MIRROR PERFECTION IN EVERY DETAIL.

variant_b.name: Professional Embrace - Studio
variant_b.prompt: Generate ABSOLUTELY PHOTOREALISTIC, HYPER-DETAILED 4K VIDEO of TWO PEOPLE in PROFESSIONAL INTIMATE EMBRACE. CRITICAL: IDENTICAL EXACT FACIAL EXPRESSIONS - same smile angle, same eye gaze, identical eyebrow position, same cheek tension, identical lip curve, same eyelid opening, PERFECT SYMMETRICAL EMOTIONAL MIRROR. Faces are MATHEMATICAL TWINS in expression and emotion.
